steps.title: Detect embedded database
steps.content: If your runner has an embedded SQL database, we will detect it. A datasource connection will be created without configuration.

steps.title: Browse the schema
steps.content: After the runner has booted, open the Datasource panel. You can navigate the database's tables an columns.

steps.title: Edit SQL
steps.content: SQL files have a special purpose editor with auto-complete, SQL execution, and results view.

steps.title: Execute SQL command
steps.content: CTRL + ENTER on any SQL command will execute the command. CTRL + SPACE performs SQL auto-complete.

steps.title: Add external databases
steps.content: You can create datasources to external databases. We support Oracle, Microsoft, mysql, and PostgreSQL.
